ref.title: Ternary Liquid-Liquid Equilibria Ethanol + 2-Butanone + 1-Butyl-3-methylimidazolium Hexafluorophosphate, 2-Propanol + 2-Butanone + 1-Butyl-3-methylimidazolium Hexafluorophosphate, and 2-Butanone + 2-Propanol + 1,3-Dimethylimidazolium Methyl Sulfate at 298.15 K
